metadata.title: CVE-2022-48319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Sensitive host secret disclosed in cmk-update-agent.log file in Tribe29'sCheckmk <= 2.1.0p13, Checkmk <= 2.0.0p29, and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0(EOL) allows an attacker to gain access to the host secret through theunprotected agent updater log file.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
